name: Splicer (breakableBird)
description:
Created for the A2B2 Game Jam for Charity. Everything in the game including the assets and code were made in 2 days except for the song, which I made a while ago.

CONTROLS: 

- Left click to use the remote control

- Return key to proceed through menus

Create randomly generated creatures using corruption. Your corruption 'meter' is on the left side of the tank. If it reaches 0 then you must destroy your creation to gain it back. Choose the amount of corruption you wish to spend on a splice with the plus and minus buttons.
